abstract: Organizers of New York City's St Patrick's Day Parade plan to announce George J Mitchell, former majority leader of United States Senate, has been chosen as grand marshal; it is unclear whether Mayor Bill de Blasio will take part in parade, as he has skipped parades in his first two years in office because openly gay groups have been barred from participating; two gay and lesbian groups will participate in parade in 2016.
lead_paragraph: George J. Mitchell, a former senator who presided over power-sharing negotiations in Northern Ireland, has been named grand marshal of the parade, which will include two gay and lesbian groups.

headline.main: Peace Broker to Lead Way in St. Patrick’s Day Parade
headline.print_headline: Peace Broker to Lead Way in St. Patrick’s Day Parade

snippet: George J. Mitchell, a former senator who presided over power-sharing negotiations in Northern Ireland, has been named grand marshal of the parade, which will include two gay and lesbian groups.
